allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase III Todo AI Chatbot with Groq LLM integration

Implemented conversational AI interface for task management:
- Added Groq LLM integration with llama-3.3-70b-versatile model
- Created MCP server with 5 task operation tools
- Built TodoAgent for natural language processing
- Added chat API endpoints with conversation management
- Created chat UI with real-time messaging
- Added database models for conversations and messages

Bug fixes and improvements:
- Fixed bcrypt version compatibility \(downgraded to 4.0.1\)
- Upgraded Groq SDK from 0.4.0 to 1.0.0
- Added GROQ_API_KEY to Settings configuration
- Registered chat router in main application

Phase III features:
- Natural language task management via AI chat
- Conversation history persistence
- Real-time AI responses with tool execution
- Seamless integration with Phase II dashboard

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
